casebody.data:
First Department,

February, 1938.

(February 4, 1938.) Guaranty Trust Company of New York, as Assignee of Louis S. Berg, Deceased, and M. Frances Berg, as Executrix, etc., of Louis S. Berg, Deceased, Respondents, v. Amtrog Trading Corporation, Appellant.

Judgment and order unanimously reversed, with costs, and the motion denied, on the ground that the affidavits raised a triable issue. Present — Martin, P. J., O’Malley, Townley, Cohn and Callahan, JJ.
